archimate:ApplicationService.name: Business Reporting Service
archimate:ApplicationService.documentation:
Shares the functionality of providing detailed reports using unified views of enterprise data. This includes, but is not limited to, financial statements, financial information, non-financial information and regulatory filings such as annual and quarterly financial statements.
Based on XBRL (eXtensible Business Reporting Language) Specification http://www.xbrl.org/Specification/XBRL-2.1/REC-2003-12-31/XBRL-2.1-REC-2003-12-31+corrected-errata-2013-02-20.html

properties.value: [ Exposed for reuse as main service | Exposed for reuse as supporting service | Reused ]
